title: 2/25/22    Best Of  DP - Doug Gottlieb & Jason Smith Guest Hosting
itunes:title: 2/25/22    Best Of  DP - Doug Gottlieb & Jason Smith Guest Hosting
description:
On the Friday edition of The Best Of The Doug Gottlieb Show: Coming off of Demar Derozan's game-winning shot Thursday night, Doug and Jason are reminded of how Lebron and the Lakers did not want to go after Derozan. That leads to a conversation about the Lakers and how Lebron will be perceived by fans in the end.

Lakers insider Bill Oram joins the guys to talk about the acrimony between Lebron, his camp and the Lakers. Former NFL Scout John Middlekauff joins the guys to talk about Aaron Rodgers and the Packers and the other major headlines around the NFL this week.

Doug and Jason address the Eric Bienemy situation. Doug thinks if Eric Bienemy was the right fit for a team, he would have gotten a head coaching job by now. Lakers insider Bill Oram joins the guys to talk about the acrimony between Lebron, his camp and the Lakers.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
